tool_description: Calculates systematic error corrections and generates correction curves for dimensional measuring instruments based on calibration results.

measurement_errors.description: Systematic errors at each point in micrometers

interpolation_points.description: Number of interpolation points for correction curve

error_messages: Data array mismatch: calibration_points and measurement_errors must have equal length.
Invalid correction method: Use one of [linear_fit, polynomial_fit, spline_interpolation, lookup_table].
Polynomial degree out of range: Use degree between 1 and 5 for stable fitting.
Insufficient data points: Need at least 3 points for correction curve generation.
Curve fitting failed: Unable to generate stable correction curve with provided data.
usage: Provide calibration points and corresponding errors. Select appropriate correction method based on error behavior. Tool generates correction curves and correction values.

correction_curve.description: Correction values across measurement range in micrometers

curve_points.description: Measurement points for correction curve in millimeters

fitting_quality.description: R-squared value indicating curve fit quality

correction_equation.description: Mathematical equation for the correction curve

residual_errors.description: Residual errors after correction in micrometers
